analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol:
	Contract ProofPresaleToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#129)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#369-377):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#374-376)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#376-377)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#332-346) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#343-344)

Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#369-377) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#374-376)

ProofPresaleToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#116-117)
ProofPresaleToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#114-116)
ProofPresaleToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#116)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of ProofPresaleToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/23/0xc47f25a40e12f7f07fabcc996148d1e1326903d2.sol#151-152) is not in mixedCase
